extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuRenderer

      • open

        public void open(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        Closes the current render for the viewer if any is present and opens this render instead. This render has a link back to the previous render and once closed will open the previous menu again.
        will notify the OnRenderStateListener if present
        Specified by:
        open in interface MenuRenderer
        Parameters:
        viewer - the player to open this renderer to

      • open

        public void open(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer,
                 boolean doparent)
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        Closes the current render for the viewer if any is present and opens this render instead. If parent is true this render will get a link back to the previous render and once that's closed it will open the previous menu again.
        will notify the OnRenderStateListener if present
        Specified by:
        open in interface MenuRenderer
        Parameters:
        viewer - the player to open this renderer to
        doparent - if true, closing this renderer will reopen the renderer that was open prior to this renderer

      • close

        public void close(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        will notify the OnRenderStateListener if present
        Specified by:
        close in interface MenuRenderer
        Parameters:
        viewer - the player to close out of this renderer

      • closeSilent

        public void closeSilent(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer)
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        to be called from inventory events - won't close the actual inventory, but will untrack this player. will notify the OnRenderStateListener if present
        Specified by:
        closeSilent in interface MenuRenderer
        Parameters:
        viewer - the player that left/closed this renderer

      • isClosedByAPI

        public boolean isClosedByAPI(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Specified by:
        isClosedByAPI in interface MenuRenderer
        Returns:
        true if the renderer was closed by the api and should prevent anti-glitch triggers if another menu was opened while this menu rendered

      • think

        public void think(AnimationManager animations)
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        this method shall update all animated IElements within the menu.
        Specified by:
        think in interface MenuRenderer
        Parameters:
        animations - is a tracker to prevent double frame advancement for shared anim objects

      • setRenderListener

        public void setRenderListener(OnRenderStateListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        Set the OnRenderStateListener to this renderer. This can be used to initialize values on the menu.
        Specified by:
        setRenderListener in interface MenuRenderer
        Parameters:
        listener - the new render state listener to use

      • getRenderListener

        public OnRenderStateListener getRenderListener()
        Description copied from interface: MenuRenderer
        Retrieve the OnRenderStateListener for this renderer. This can be used to initialize values on the menu.
        Specified by:
        getRenderListener in interface MenuRenderer
        Returns:
        the current render state listener
